Setting.Name: BorderWidth
Setting.Help: Sets the border width of the logo image

Setting.Name: CssClass
Setting.Help: Sets a CSS class on the logo

Setting.Name: LinkCssClass
Setting.Help: Sets a CSS class on the hyperlink

Setting.Name: InjectSvg
Setting.Help: If set to true, the control will read the contents of the Logo file, look for an svg tag, and inject it directly into the hyperlink
